biography.p1: Mi tío Jimmy Aksel Gil's solo project.
biography.p2: After long time without releasing a record, begins the recording of his first solo album from the three Magnética records (Maida Vale, Friogenia and Perdita mundi) working at the same time in the Good Bye Lening band with whom he has published three singles so far.
biography.p3: The new album is expected to be ready by the end of 2023 and it will be produced by Carly Yeah. Until the realease date you will enjoy the preview in the next acoustic shows and by social networks.
